title: Game of Thrones
resume: Seven noble families fight for control of the mythical land of Westeros. Friction between the houses leads to full-scale war. All while a very ancient evil awakens in the farthest north. Amidst the war, a neglected military order of misfits, the Night's Watch, is all that stands between the realms of men and icy horrors beyond.

Weiss Creator Discussions   Reviews Videos   Images   Changes Report Share Discussions General  214 Content Issues  12 Images Backdrops  65 Posters  167 Videos Trailers  3 Teasers  0 Clips  0 Featurettes  0 Opening Credits  0 Top Billed Cast Emilia Clarke Daenerys Targaryen Kit Harington Jon Snow Peter Dinklage Tyrion Lannister Lena Headey Cersei Lannister Nikolaj Coster-Waldau Jaime Lannister Full Cast & Crew Last Season Season 7 2017 | 7 Episodes View All Seasons Social Reviews  2 Discussions  226 A review by Vlad Ulbricht  9.0 Written by  Vlad Ulbricht  on May 11, 2017 Cruel, bloody, vulgar, Machiavellian, unrepentant. And that is just the writing. The camera angles, the score, the pacing mesh together for grand storytelling: a mix of horror, swords and sorcery, and endless treachery.  And all of that would be somewhat squandered if it wasn't for the best casting I've ever seen. From Lena Headey as soft spoken Cersei to Peter Vaughan as ancient Maester Aemon, each character pulses with depth and believability. Peter Dinklage may have sacrificed a virgin princess to get this role; I've never seen a better fit, not in size (though there is that) but in the w...  read the rest.
